name: Mont Blanc
hint: The highest mountain in the Alps, on the border of France and Italy

name: Matterhorn
hint: An iconic pyramid-shaped peak on the Swiss-Italian border in the Alps

name: Elbrus
hint: The highest mountain in Europe, a dormant volcano in the Caucasus Mountains of Russia

name: Grossglockner
hint: Austria's highest mountain, located in the Hohe Tauern range of the Alps

name: Monte Rosa
hint: The second-highest mountain in the Alps and Western Europe, on the Swiss-Italian border

name: Ben Nevis
hint: The highest mountain in the British Isles, located in the Scottish Highlands

name: Olympus
hint: The highest mountain in Greece, mythological home of the ancient Greek gods

name: Etna
hint: Europe's most active volcano, located on the east coast of Sicily, Italy

name: Zugspitze
hint: The highest mountain in Germany, on the border with Austria in the Bavarian Alps

name: Galdhopiggen
hint: The highest mountain in Norway and Scandinavia, in the Jotunheimen mountain range
